title: ArtyTorrent Pack 71-Zero-G Sounds of the 70s VSTi DXi RTAS AU
description:
ArtyTorrent Pack 71-Zero-G Sounds of the 70s VSTi DXi RTAS AU
-------------------------------------------------------------

I&#039;m not really a fan of construction kit ROMplers for two main reasons.
1. Construction kits encourage arranging/remixing into ready-made songs, rather than experimentation and composition.
2. It&#039;s harder to find the precise sound you need than with a loop library organised into categories.

Unfortunately for producers who desire complete control of their samples, ROMplers are becoming more common. Zero-G&#039;s Sounds of the Seventies contains some superb samples, but it will take you considerable time to work through them. Since I don&#039;t have time to render each and every sample from this pack, I&#039;m posting the full disc, as cracked and provided by Talio and AI. (Thanks guys!)

This instrument uses the NI Intakt sample player and has authentic recordings of loops and oneshots of genres as diverse as Disco and Punk rock.

This is a DVD disc image in ISO format compressed into 30 RAR files and includes a keygen. It can be used as a standalone app, or as a plug-in in many formats. I&#039;ve tested the VSTi version with Win XP, but this release should also work on Mac OSX. Note: It does not work with Mac OS 9.

Installation instructions are included in a text file.

--
Arty - "Disco Punk?"
19th February 2008.

P.S. The large size of this torrent means it will take a long time to initially transfer, so please be patient in the few first few days, and keep seeding for as long as possible.
